# identifier

**Instance Property**

An optional, unique identifier for the storyboard segue that you can specify using the Identity inspector in Interface Builder.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier? { get }
```

## Discussion

You use this property if you override the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSeguePerforming/prepare(for:sender:)] method of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSeguePerforming] protocol.

## Inspecting a Storyboard Segue

- **sourceController**: The starting/containing view controller or window controller for the storyboard segue.
- **destinationController**: The ending/contained view controller or window controller for the storyboard segue.
- **NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier**
